title: Lamb shoulder with purple sprouting broccoli
description: A really easy one-pot recipe. Don't be tempted to skip the anchovies - they impart a wonderful savoury flavour to the lamb.
ingredients: 1 x 1.5kg/3lb 5oz lamb shoulder, boned by the butcher, not rolled and tied
500g/1lb 2oz purple sprouting broccoli, tough stems removed
2 tbsp good-quality extra virgin olive oil
